alert.note: Alert for Cavalier; Eastern Walsh County; Ramsey; Western Walsh County (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 3:39AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cavalier, northeastern Ramsey and western Walsh Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 339 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hove Mobile Park, or 16 miles southeast of Langdon, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fairdale around 350 AM CDT. Adams around 415 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cavalier; Eastern Walsh County; Ramsey; Western Walsh County
